name: Cosmic Warriors
description:
Game introduction:
This is an animation game. Fight against evil enemies who want to invade your planet with hundreds of your favorite characters. Join this game and fulfill your mission of Galaxy!Game features
[Call of the Universe]
Awaken more than 100 kinds of martial artists and summon The strongest warrior in the galaxy.
[Cosmic adventure]Strong trials, artificial laboratories, martial arts peak competitions, cosmic secret adventures, endless fantasy adventures and a variety of innovative gameplay. challenge yourself and become the strongest in the universe;
[Lineup match]
Combine and match the strongest fighters from each galaxy, racial restraint characteristics and skills, test your pre-war strategy, and create unbeaten legends;
[Cosmic Rescue]
Strong enemies invade the world. Defend your planet to complete the mission;
[ladder challenge]
PVP challenge comes from the strongest warrior in the universe and competes for the highest honor in the universe
